title: Lentil and vegetarian sausage soup
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '200g brown lentils', '1 small onion, chopped', '60g finely shredded cabbage', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 vegetarian smoked sausages, diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '2 vegetable stock cubes', '1 5/8 pints water', '1 bay leaf', '1 teaspoon thyme leaves', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt and pepper to taste']
